item.title: Achieving an A Grade with Traefik
item.description: Learn how to configure your Traefik instance to be SSL Labs A-Grade worthy

item.title: Learning to Love YAML - Converting Your Traefik Setup From Cmdline into YAML
item.description: Migrate your Traefik setup into YAML files for an easier to manage reverse proxy experience!

item.title: Set Up Traefik on Docker - A Modern Reverse Proxy Solution
item.description: Configure Traefik to run in a docker container to provide reverse proxy services for the rest of your containers!
